website_summaries.verdict: Top choice for microfiber enthusiasts who want to use fewer chemicals.
pros: Microfiber sucks up dust and dirt fast
Mop is extremely wide, so you can clean a whole room or house quickly
Works on all types of flooring
Pads can be washed and used again
Adjustable pole makes it comfortable for petite people or kids to use
Package includes a dust mop pad to "sweep" before mopping
Bonus points for superior customer service that sends replacements when necessary and replies to questions within hours
cons: If you have small rooms, you can save money by buying a smaller mop
Some had trouble removing small, sticky spots

customer_reviews.title: I love this mop!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not exaggerating when I say that this mop has changed my life. I used to have to get down on the floor and clean every inch by hand, because every other mop that I tried left streaks and skipped over dirty spots. Even though I love my floor, I really regretted getting it. It was such a ridiculous amount of work. With this mop, the floor is wiped clean and shiny the first time. I'm saving so much time, and it looks beautiful. I'm ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value Commercial Quality Metal Mop Frame & Mop Pads- Useless Dusting Pad
customer_reviews.text: I am so thankful to find this mop and mop pads. This frame is heavy duty strong and can be adjusted to reach under furniture and beds. These pads are heavy duty thick and the fibers clean exceptionally well without streaking. The inside cushion can hold more water than any other pads I have used yet can easily be squeezed out. This is by far the best mop and pads I have ever tried. With that being said....I do not like the dusting pad. The looped edges catch all the hair & dust & get that tangled in it. The rest of the pad doesn’t grab the dust.
customer_reviews.author: cherryroses

customer_reviews.title: Tip for moving cushion on rod.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Very clean. But with a lil drag. Maybe the microfiber need to break in a bit. A few reviews states that the sponge handle in the rod was in a pointless position. I tried to slide it up and it would have torn before it would actually move. BUT I slid a brochure under it and it moves like butter. Look at pic
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: This is actually a great product from a design and performance perspective
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a great product from a design and performance perspective. Quality is a different matter. The fact that the handle is splitting after just a few uses (see picture) is disappointing. I paid more for a "professional" mop and fully expected durable construction. Contacted the seller and had a new mop handle in just a few days - GREAT customer service.
customer_reviews.author: RSP

customer_reviews.title: Broke before I even got to use it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is sturdy and well made but the plastic piece connecting the mop to the handle is weak compared to the weight of the rest of the product and snapped off when I went to use it for the first time. Item is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: dyc612

customer_reviews.title: It looks very sturdy.. however
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the swifter, this mop blows it out of the water. It looks very sturdy.. however, do not let that fool you! I bought this so I could clean my vinyl floors with ease. After only 15 minutes of use the middle of the mop just snapped right in half. I spent 40$ plus I bought all the extra microfiber attachments so this mop could break after 15 minutes of use. Hopefully microfiber wholesale can send me a new one, so I can get back to cleaning. Until then, the swifter will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. Thought since it had such rave reviews it'd be amazing and was unpleasantly surprised. Too big to actually manoeuvr in corners, a bit stiff. I worked in housekeeping for over 30 years and every mop I used in that field was better. Don't like that it doesn't hold any disinfectant at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Eby

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This mop seemed large and sturdy but after only 3 months it broke. Very disappointing after spending $40 on a mop. I would appreicate a replacement but can't get through to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: M Wood

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste ur money. The bottom part of the handle that fits into the mop bottom was broke. What's worse is that they knew it was broke n had heavy black tape around it. I thought the tape was part of packaging n removed it. The handle fell off the mop. There was no selection for NO STARS.
customer_reviews.author: Trina K. Wasco

customer_reviews.title: I need to replace it for a new one
customer_reviews.text: I am very positive it would be a really great tool to clean up. The problem is that as soon as I open the package today, there was a broken piece that didn't allow me to assemble it. The fotos showed the piece I referred to. I wanted to start using it asap. 😢 I don't think this issue will subtract quality from the product value but I could not tried to confirm such value.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Losa

customer_reviews.title: Weld broke on second use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the weld on this mop broke the second time it was used. i was very disappointed as I had purchased a commercial mop to enable us to save time and clean more efficiently. Must be the wrong commercial mop.
customer_reviews.author: Northeast

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop But Doesn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: I use this mop professionally. It's such a great mop; easy to use and carry from job to job. I purchased it because it seemed so well made. I love how easy it is to attach and remove the washable microfiber pads. However, within 6 MONTHS, the rivets that hold the velcro onto the metal plate are popping off. I've lost several rivets and it won't be long before the mop is totally unusable. I am very disappointed and am already looking to find a replacement product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: I just renovated my kitchen and have new wood floors, wanted to try this. It does not work well at all. It picks up very small bits of dust, etc but nothing any bigger.Does not get in the corners well at all. Does gather clumps of pet hair, but you'll have to pull it off to wash. Going back to my old method, where I can just throw away the disposable clothes. Plus it gets in the corners much better.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wide Path Duster/Mop
customer_reviews.text: After using a pocket style microfiber duster mop, I got tired of trying to get the pads on correctly and purchased this as a replacement. I love the wide path. I really like that the mop head has Velcro grips on the bottom for the pad so there's no fumbling with getting the pad on. The pole is heavy duty, not flimsy. The only downside I see is in the dark blue looped duster pad. When I'm finished, I have to use the attachment from my vacuum to remove the dust, hair, etc. I do this prior to washing so my machine doesn't get all gunked up. I have washed and dried the pads several times now with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: allaboutcats

customer_reviews.title: Dislike this mop!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have other Don Aslett mops that I purchased on QVC years ago. I still have them and they are great. However I am now physically challenged and needed additional mops for other rooms. I dislike this mop too the point of hating it. It is heavy and falls over constantly. Picking it up is difficult for me. The pads are good and fit my other mops. That is the only thing I can say that is positive. I wish I had bought more of the Don Aslett mops years ago. I realize this review is geared to my needs and may not be appropriate for others
customer_reviews.author: Kittens Mom

customer_reviews.title: You need this dust mop!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome dust mop! I had been looking for a new one for a long time to replace the swiffer. This one has a heavy duty handle, gets under all of the furniture, cleans the corners, and gets up close to clean the bottom of molding. I just take the duter off, shake it off and pull off any hairs or debris. Throw in the washer when needed. I ordered the green microfiber pads as well that were recommended somewhere on here. My hardwood and tile floors are so clean now. Going to get rid of the swiffer :)
customer_reviews.author: Della Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Whiz cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a microfiber mop and the handle broke so I purchased this item due to the steel handle, non rotating head for walls and updated microfiber heads. The handle is sturdy (I tend to put more pressure on a mop than I need to), it adjusts easily and can be set to not rotate for when I wash walls. The 18 inch size made washing my floor much quicker than my previous 12 inch head; it took half the time! Typically I use a spray cleaning and wipe with the microcloth but this one suggests just using water and it worked well. I recommend this quality product for dusting and washing floors.
customer_reviews.author: Tthomp3

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic duster/mop system!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best duster/wet mop I've ever used! Love that the pads can be thrown in the washer when done. I bought extra for use in the garage - don't want my house pads getting gunk on them. This system saves me so much time. Half of our home is tile - about 1,200 sq feet. Used to take me 30-45 mins just to do the kitchen/dining area with my little sponge mop (thank you O-Cedar for discontinuing selling the sponges for that piece of junk!) now, i can do all the floors in the same amount of time and it doesn't wear me out. It's actually fun to use and no longer a dreaded chore!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kowalik

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mop kit
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the spinning mop but that thing was a dud because after awhile, the handle collapsed and I had to stoop to mop. Total back pain. This microfiber mop kit is 1000% better!! The order came with a handwritten note. Talk about great customer service with a personal touch. The handle felt sturdy and heavy which requires less pushing on my part. And the extension/swiveling capabilities are great. We recently had our floor replaced with LVT so the microfiber made sweeping and mopping a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Coconut

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new vinyl floors. It definitely outranks the OXO brand microfiber mop that I bought by a long shot. It works really well wet- I haven't even tried it dry yet. I used some Forbo floor cleaner (for my Forbo floors) and a water solution and just put the wet pads into the water, wringed it out a little and mopped with it and it worked like a charm. I also like how the stick is adjustable as I am tall and don't want to be bending down while mopping my whole house. Although it is sturdy and made of good quality, I still feel like the price is very high for the materials.
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop!
customer_reviews.text: My house is 90% tile so there is a lot of floor cleaning needed. I have a steamer but it tends to leave the floor with an uneven sheen and doesn't fit under furniture. The microfiber pads leave the floor a consistent sheen, it fold flat so can get under couches without moving them. The pad for dry mopping is efficient for dusting the floors in between mopping. Best of all the width of the mop makes mopping 2000 sq. ft. a breeze, it takes almost no time at all. Touch ups are great too, just rinse the pad in the sink wring it out and you are done, no bucket needed. Love, Love this mop!!!
customer_reviews.author: d.kiehl

customer_reviews.title: My housekeeper gave it a thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: The best review I could give is from my housekeeper. I asked her whether or not it was okay and better than the one I had already. She gave it a big thumbs up, because it covered more territory and could reach under sofa and other hard to reach surfaces. So it's a keeper. I would add that the instructions are clearly written, and I learned that spraying the cleaner on the microfiber mop is more effective than fully wetting and wringing it out. Who knew? Thank you Microfiber Wholesale.
customer_reviews.author: Yogini

customer_reviews.title: High quality mop
customer_reviews.text: I waited several months to write this review to see how this dust mop would hold up over time and to see if the pads would launder well. I’m happy to report this is one of my favorite house keeping purchases. The map handle is secure, the head swivels easily around corners and under furniture, the pads wash beautifully and are easy to remove and reattach to the mop head. I use this as dry dust mop on my hardwoods on a frequent basis, and occassionally spritz vinegar and water on my wood and tile floors and mop with this. It works equally well in both applications.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've used this mop only three times so far on a brand new hardwood floor. Prior to purchasing this mop I used a spray bottle and rags (on my hands and knees). I am initially very, very pleased. I have no hesitation to give it five stars. If something happens over time that changes my assessment of the mop, I will update my review. UPDATE: After many more uses, I continue to have only the highest praise for this mop!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It's been really easy to use with spray-and-mop style cleaners
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because it was about $40 (maybe I overpaid?), but it works so well. No fighting to keep the mop pad on--it's got soooo much velcro it doesn't budge. The wet pad has a rigidity to the actual pad that I think helps too. I haven't washed the pads yet, and haven't used the dusting one (I'm lazy and figure it can either get vacuumed or stick to the wet pad--whatever!). It's been really easy to use with spray-and-mop style cleaners. It takes kind of a lot of room to store because the head is so wide, but it's worth it for fewer passes when mopping.
customer_reviews.author: Delayed Gratification

customer_reviews.title: It's good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the mop a lot. Additionally, the company sent an instructional email which for house-keeping dumdums like me, was greatly appreciated. The bad part is, this system is not like a Roomba unfortunately. The floors will not be automatically cleaned by this mop, I'll have to participate. Also, another reviewer recommended these mop heads, so I bought them too and they seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Oleander

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new microfiber mop that I can use on my new floors and am very happy with this. It covers a lot of floor very quickly. Came with 3 mop heads and 2 really nice microfiber cloths that you can always use. I like that the handle is adjustable to reach under furniture. It shipped in an extraordinarily large box, personally i found it to be little obnoxious that such a large box was used for a significantly smaller item, but I don't think that's the seller's issue as much as it is Amazon's. Great item and i'm super happy to have ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, the search is over.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mop and tried my sisters Swiffer. I felt like it wasn’t touching the floors. I kept looking at my cleaning lady’s mop and decided to try and find one like hers. This mop is even better for me in my opinion, because it’s a lot longer and the Velcro pad is so easy to use. It cuts the time in half. I actually like cleaning my floors now. I bought it with the Bona floor cleaner. The adjustable height makes the mop easy on your back. I have high foot traffic and need to mop daily. I hope it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Shamoon Budhwani

customer_reviews.title: The best mop!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through all kinds of mops and this is definitely the best one by far! It is light but tough, the microfiber pads (it comes with a pair) are easy to install and really grabs dirt! It is built in a way that allows me to mop underneath any piece of furniture. Really good buy and I hope to find it again when it's time for a replacement. Oh, and it comes with a pair of microfiber cleaning cloths that do a fantastic job in dusting of furniture surfaces leaving not trace of cat hair behind, which amazes me! Nothing else works as well as these cloths when it comes to grabbing pet fur!
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: A Great Time Saving Mop.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things that every time I use it I truly appreciate how much easier it has made my life. The microfiber dust pad traps the dust easily and efficiently. It easily reaches under low clearance furniture and into corners to get that spot that always gets missed. Most important thing is to set the handle to the correct height, which is just under chin level. The packaging was quite broken down when I received it, but the mop was in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually leave reviews.  However....
customer_reviews.text: I just received my mop. I was pleasantly surprised by just how well it is made. It looks and feels heavy duty. I immediately mopped my kitchen floor. It had no issues with the mop staying attached to the handle and it didn't flip over, like other mops of this style. So far, it seems to be a fantastic purchase. On a side note, I really appreciate the hand written thank you note from the seller. It makes me feel like if I do have a problem, they will help me through it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Floors shinier than ever
customer_reviews.text: I love the mop handle and especially the mop head. We have had our wood floors for a while and they never seemed clean. This mop's cleaning pad does a better job than the Bona I used previously. Our floors have remained shiny and clean and I mopped 2 days ago. Our son recommended this mop to us after he purchased one at the recommendation of a friend of his.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, BEST MOP EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I used to mop the floors on my hands and knees, this mop changed everything! So much easier, is actually fun and the results are fantastic, what else could you ask for in a mop! My favorite technique: Get the pad barely damp with water then spray pad with Bona then spray Bona on the floor and mop away! Respray mop pad with Bona when it seems to dry out. Couldn’t be easier! Also, very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Nowadays there usually isn't great "personal" customer service. However, when I received my order there was a heartfelt, handwritten thank you included from Blythe. This is a 3rd generation, family-owned business and I would not have know that without reading his note. I would highly recommend this company to anyone!!! Thank you for the "thank you" note, Blythe! What a pleasant and thoughtful surprise! Oh and LOVE the MOP btw....works great for my laminate/vinyl floor. I have a huge first floor kitchen, living room area and I LOVE the bigger sized mop to cover more area!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori J

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy Mop that Sweeps Away the Competition!
customer_reviews.text: This mop is very well-constructed and looks as though it will be last for many years even with regular, hard use. The extra-large mop head makes it quick and easy to use. I also like that it has spare covers and micro-fibre cloths included. The instructions that come with it are useful and give tips on how best to use the mop heads, both dry and wet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mop!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, how can a mop make me SO happy! I knew my old mop was harder to use but THIS mop seems to be life changing. I just did a test with the duster head and in a second I was done. With a cat who sheds constantly, this product is life changing. Can’t wait to use it on my tiled kitchen floor. I think I’m ready to give up my love affair with dry Swiffer sheets and save myself a tin of money. I love the size of the head. The amount of space this mop covers is awesome. I’m in love!
customer_reviews.author: PCH

customer_reviews.title: This is the best mop ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mop ever. It is very well made. I've used it for 1/2 year now and no parts are broken. The handle can be lay almost flat to clean under the dresser and desks. I love this mop. I used to own two separate Lumber Liquidators mops. They are the worst mops. I had to jerry rig them with plastic fasteners to keep them from falling apart. I hate these Lumber Liquidators mops. I finally threw them in the trash. I wish I had found these 18" Professional Microfiber mop sooner, it would have made my life a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tran

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mop and cleaning kit. It came with three mop heads, all washable, and three microfiber dust cloths. I enjoyed using them all, and they have washed after use without any problem. I put them in a mesh bag so they wouldn't stick to other laundry, and everything came out clean. The mop heads are well constructed and easy to exchange. The mop itself can be extended in length, or shortened, so that it is just right for whatever height you are. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stowell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for laminate floors
customer_reviews.text: This mopping system is easy to use, and gets into places that I used to have to move furniture to access! It's so easy to clean under the furniture. I also love that I'm just cleaning with water, and not using some cleaner on top of the new flooring. Great system! Once in a while when using the wet mop, if I move it too quick the mop flips over, but that rarely happens and it's never damaged the flooring. I just need to learn to use it the way they suggest and not the "old" way of mopping :)
customer_reviews.author: Fayette Terlouw

customer_reviews.title: The best mop I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: After replacing our carpet 2 years ago with vinyl planks, I was having a rough time finding a mop that worked well and was not 150.00 one. This is actually our 2nd mop, only had to repurchase because my silly husband thought it was in the mix of about half a dozen terrible mops I kept out in the garage. I immediately reordered because we love this mop so much. It doesn't flip back on itself and scrape our floors like other mops have. The pads are easy to clean and durable. Will always keep using this mop....and it now has a label to ensure the husband doesn't mistake it for one of the other guys.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mop
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many Bona's. I loved them, but they kept falling apart. The last one only lasted three months. I decided to buy something very basic, but didn't want one of those messy string mops. This mop fit the bill and is very easy to use. I get the mop head wet in the sink, wring it out if necessary and then finish up. I can get the floor as wet or dry as I like. I can use vinegar or just plain water. When finished you just throw the mop head in the washer. I love it. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dee S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great on laminate wood floors
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mop I have ever owned. I have laminate wood floors that streak easily. I have used Bova, Swifter, Hoover Floormate, string mops, sponge mops, Bissell steamer, and other microfiber mops. None compare to this. Just this mop, dampened, and a little vinegar & water in a spray bottle have my floors sparkling clean with no streaks.
customer_reviews.author: mizzcandi

customer_reviews.title: Customer service from the company is good, as they addressed an issue with defective pads
customer_reviews.text: Customer service from the company is good, as they addressed an issue with defective pads. Mop is very cheap quality especially the dust pads. Save your money and buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: Peter T

customer_reviews.title: Bad ,bad
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning I was so happy with this mop After a few uses The Velcro from metal start pelting off What a mess. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: The mop that is the king of all mops.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, I dont think I can give enough praise for this dustmop/ mop. Absolutley the best mop I have ever used in my entire life. It collected the pet hair and dust so well. Statistically speaking I would say its 75% better at a minimum than any other mop or broom I've used. The mop collected any other left over pet hair or dust (which was not much) into a nice pile, rather than spreading it around my floor. The cherry on top was the lovely handwritten note from the business owner ❤ . This is officially the last mop I will ever use and I will continue using it for forever.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Best mop on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mop! I bought it over a month ago, however, because I hate to clean my laminate flooring I have been procrastinating. I finally decided it was time to get down and clean my floors. I was anxious to try this mop after the reviews, and I was not disappointed! My floors were clean and shiny with about a third of the effort of the microfiber mop I was currently using. It seems silly to get so excited over a mop, but anything that saves me time and effort, and with such a beautiful result, what can I say..yup I'm excited about it! I recommend you by this mop. You will not be disappointed either.
customer_reviews.author: Tori S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mop for lazy people!
customer_reviews.text: This mop is so easy to use and it cleans very well. All you have to do is take the pad off, rinse it, and you're good to go. I generally hate mopping and this makes tolerate it. It's especially nice when you just want to mop a small portion of your house, like the kitchen, which tends to need it more. You don't need to spend a bunch of time filling a bucket with soap and water etc. You just throw on the pad and you're good to go. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Kilamyan

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS MOP
customer_reviews.text: This is a life changing mop. The construction is super sturdy and the telescoping handle is critical. Guys, you can mop actually standing up! No more bending over! I absolutely love it and wish I had bought it sooner. Can't believe I've been using a swiffer even for small messes, that ends today! It does a great job of cleaning with just water, and the pads are so easy to clean in the washing machine. To top it all off, it arrived with a handwritten note from the seller thanking me for supporting their 3rd generation business. They included their email and phone number to reach them if I ever encounter any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Keating

customer_reviews.title: This Mop Beats All The Rest
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mop to clean my painted garage floor. I live in Michigan so over the winter months my garage floor can get pretty dirty including road salt stains. This mop worked perfectly with very little effort. For my project, I used a gallon of hot water and a quarter cup of ammonia (wear rubber gloves). Because the pad easily removes and attaches to the mop handle, I simply rinsed the pad in the pail of water and ammonia a few times and I was done. The floor looks great. As a bonus you also receive some microfiber cloths that I used to clean some dirty spots from my walls.
customer_reviews.author: TommyG

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of mops, but I'm so glad I got this one because it's great. It is sturdy and glides around very well on the floor. I can adjust the handle to suit my tall height. Sometimes, it shortens a tiny bit while using it, and I have to readjust and tighten it, but other than that, it's perfect. I really like the dust pad that came with it. High quality and picks up all the dirt, dust and dog hair on my wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reusable, washable, quick cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today, and I've already used it. I used to use a sponge mop for occasional damp mopping. I don't like the idea of disposable, but I was thinking about buying a Swiffer for quick mopping of specific areas, such as near the cats' litter boxes, and their food and water dishes. But then I saw this and it seemed perfect. And it is! It's exactly what I need for those quick cleanups! I really love that it's reusable and washable, rather than disposable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Keckler

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Norwex!
customer_reviews.text: My norwex mop broke at the base. I looked up how much it would cost for me to replace just the base and it was going to be $31.99 plus tax and shipping. The problem is, it is flimsy plastic and so I decided to see what other similar products were available via amazon. I found this and ordered it and haven't regretted it! It is much more durable and steady than my norwex mop. I just wish I hadn't spent over $130 on my norwex mop to begin with, and had found this one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Clean like a pro...
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this mop! my last busted mop was breaking my back....this one comes with adjustable handle, so you can customize it for your exact height. The dust mop is amazing - I get kind of a gross satisfaction seeing how much it picks up ;) It came with two microfiber pads- they fit to the mop head with velcro and stay in place. There are tons of "pro tips" in the instruction manual- they are awesome. I just spray my wood floors with a spray bottle and then mop them down with the microfiber pad. When I'm done, I rinse out the pad and let it air dry. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great option for hardwood and linoleum!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic wet/dry mop for a pretty low price. Came with extra pads, microfiber towels, and a personal note from the company with a number to call if i had any issues. I love that it swivels or locks in place and have been using it for months now with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pads are easy fit
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because the pads fit so easily onto the head of the duster/mop with velcro. The head (metal part) moves around effortlessly on the floor to get to all small spaces. But I do have a problem when I am rinsing off the mop, because the head moves around easily, it flops around and I get water all over. This mop does not fold in half to squeeze water so you have to tip the mop head to the side and let the extra water drip out, or take the mop pad off and wring it. Maybe there is another way, but I haven't discovered it yet. After many uses, I still like this product.
customer_reviews.author: JanzieP

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It's a mop! But a good mop. The rubber hand piece is a bit hard to slide/adjust up or down the handle. I found that rolling it up or down, whichever direction you need to go, then wrapping a piece of waxed paper around the shaft and rolling the grip over it makes the adjusting so easy. The mop does a really good job. We have two dogs and three cats that are inside pets, you can only imagine how much hair is shed.
customer_reviews.author: Tawcat

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: No more Swiffer for me. This is amazing. I did the whole house in about 5 minutes and it did a way better job than the Swiffer. The parquet wood floor actually looked shinier after dry dusting it. Decided to wash the duster and it washes up really quickly and well. Great product and great price. I couldn't be any happier. No more string mops in this house either. The two free microfiber cloths are great, too. I've only used cheap microfiber and was not impressed. These two did the job and washed up nicely. I'm hoping they sell them because I'd sure like to have more.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Clean floors!
customer_reviews.text: This mop cleans my floors beautifully. It is sturdy, lightweight and easy to use. It is also very quiet so I can easily and quickly clean my floors while children are napping. The reaso it gets 4 stars is that the dry microfiber cloth does not stick well at first. Mind you once I started dusting with it it stayed out. I'm probably going to buy this for my sister too.
customer_reviews.author: Saved by Grace

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Micro fiber Mop and quality handle
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. The extension handle makes cleaning large area very easy. The micro fiber cloth works very well with Bona wood floor cleaner. The head of the mop is large for easy cleaning. Comes with 2 micro fiber cleaning cloths and 1 shaggy sham. I like the micro fiber for cleaning wet and the sham for cleaning dry.
customer_reviews.author: C J M

customer_reviews.title: Dry or wet mop which covers a large area
customer_reviews.text: A lot better than Swiffer because the area of coverage is big - feels great when you are cleaning. The construction is also good and height is adjustable with a firm tightener. The mop head swivels well. While there's a dry pad which you can use to pick up small pieces of dirt, really the main function of this would be the wet mop which is great with a hand spray of water or cleaning liquid. I docked one star because this thing is expensive for what it is, but at the end of the day it is quite a good product which does what it does well.
customer_reviews.author: duepeace

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, with inadequate assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Could not attach handle to mop-pad. Two small pins included, plastic attachment piece on pad cracked, no detailed instructions. Pins fell out when I tried to use them to attach handle to mop-pad. Aside from that rather fatal flaw, items seems well constructed and designed. Updating, Microfibere Wholesale did not like my review, shipped a new mop free. that mop did not have a broken handle attachment, and did have complete instructions showing the unbroken handle attachment. I easily put the handle on and used the mop, both wet and dry. It performs as well as I had hoped it would when I originally ordered.it. Very pleased with the mop and the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rie

customer_reviews.title: It's like I never mopped before
customer_reviews.text: OK you'll think I'm working for the mop company. But I am super pleased. My whole house is laminate floored and I've been fighting streaks and dullness for a long time. It seems I was just pushing the dirt around with my first-swiffer-then-damp-sponge-mop-method. We hike 2 miles in the hills every morning with our 3 little dogs so we bring in more than usual dirt on our 16 feet. One, I repeat, ONE, time with the nice big duster, than One time with the amazing mop and my floors are gorgeous again. I am so surprised and amazed. Worth every single cent.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cracks In The Handle
customer_reviews.text: This is my replacement one. The first one I noticed cracks on the handle also. So I returned it. This one also had cracks in it but I have to leave where I live for awhile and wasn't able to return it in time. There are cracks on the handle of this one also. I don't recommend it since this is the 2nd once that I've received with cracks in the handle. And for the money it's not worth it. I'm not sure how long this will last.
customer_reviews.author: Blake's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After my wife's frustration of having a few O-Cedar's that have had the pole snap from the pad holder, I decided to look to Amazon to find something that works better. I came across this little gem and so glad I did! It works amazing and is built strong. My wife had no fear of this one breaking like the O-Cedar with just a simple twist of the handle. The added pads and microfiber cloth make this the perfect bundle. We love that we can simply toss the pads in the wash to clean them up and use again. If you are looking for a terrific dry mop for wood or vinyl floors, I highly recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.author: George Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good but pads are questionable
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for cleaning floors. I am pleased with the results, however the durability of the pads are less than satisfactory. I have used the microfiber pads about 6 times and the corner of the pads already have holes in them. After the first washing the dust mop pad has unraveled leaving it unusable. I love the microfiber cloths that came with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cook

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mop!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought that I would write a review for a mop, but this cleaning tool is a winner! It's well built, easy to use and very effective. I have hardwood floors throughout my house and vinyl in the kitchen and laundry area. This mop is a perfect size, the velcro is strong and it swivels effortlessly to allow access into narrow spaces as well. It's easy to clean and has changed mopping into a satisfying chore rather than drudgery. Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lena A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mop!  Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased a brand new home with 75% laminate flooring. This is a fantastic mop which includes a 1 dry and 2 wet velcro mophead attachments for cleaning. This mop is amazing! It’s very high-quality and has a telescopic handle to adjust your height. I had purchased a swiffer that you have to purchase the additional clothes. Big mistake as it’s very cheaply made and you need to repurchase the clothes. Trying to be more environmentally friendly so I regret buying the swiffer. This mop is a little more expensive but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well, don't know if one can LOVE a mop. But I do like this one and my only gripe is that it is so wide. A 12" one would be ideal for my use as our place isn't that big. I use one pad for mopping and one pad for drying and it works well. The pad stays on the mop and never slips off or at least hasn't so far. No matter what you use, cleaning a floor is never fun but of all the things I've tried this microfiber mop has worked the best. After I'm done, I toss the pads in the washer and dryer and they come out looking new again.
customer_reviews.author: M. James

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mop for a tall guy like myself
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'5 and using mops has always been an ordeal, bending over and causing me no end of discomfort while cleaning. Now, with this mop I am able to stand up straight and clean the floors. I love this mop - the combination of dry and wet, and the ability to mop with just water is phenomenal. I really am so glad that I purchased this mop and receiving a thank you note HANDWRITTEN from the company sealed the deal and they gained a customer for life. Would definitely recommend this mop (and have!) to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mop Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 years old so I know mops. This is the best one I have ever owned. It is easy to use and gathers all the dust so effectively. I am a quilter so I create lots of fabric dust when I cut fabric for my quilts. Even after vacuuming with my $2,000 electrolux vacuum, there is still dust when I finish the floors with this mop. I love it as my floors get really clean. We have travertine tile in our home and the extra attachment for wet mopping is wonderful too.
customer_reviews.author: Empress of the Known Universe

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Very well made and does a great job. The large head makes for quick cleanups - dry or damp. I especially like the damp mop pad (comes with two), as it allows me to do a rejuvenation of my tile floors easily quickly and with little effort. Much easier than my wet mop that I now use less frequently for really dirty jobs. Costs a little more, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: soil doc

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: While sitting at an emergency room waiting to get a shot for my allergies I saw a worker cleaning the floors with one of these, she was sweeping and mopping at the same time! I got home and immediately put in an order for this on Amazon and I have to tell you, I simply love it. You should watch a video on how to use it first but with one pass you sweep, dust AND mop all at once!!!! I could see my allergens coming off the floor and getting stuck to the bottom of the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlie

customer_reviews.title: Good overall mop
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok on most areas but not so well on tight areas like around toilet areas, I do like the duster pad for my wood floor areas & the mop pads are fairly easy to hand wash until they need washed in the washer,Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: LL Bell

customer_reviews.title: Best mop I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Been mopping floors for many, many years, but this is the easiest, best mop I've ever had. It cleans in the corners, along the edges, catches dirt stuck in the little grooves, can even tilt it to clean the baseboards. Easy to put together, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. I saw it on a youtube video from a professional house cleaner and decided to give it a try. It is the perfect size to get the job done quickly. When I use it as a wet mop, I usually go behind my work with the other pad and dry. I have hardwood floors as well as laminate. The dust mop is great for dog hair pickup, but yes, it has to be shaken out. I ordered extra pads so I wasn't washing them all the time. I love how my floors look with this mop!
customer_reviews.author: M. Willet

customer_reviews.title: after 3 years and heavy use...its sill like new
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in July 2015. Its all I use throughout our house. we have wood, tile or stone. I was mentioning to my daughter, its still LIKE NEW. Hers is too and she's all hardwood floors. I throw the pads in the washer after every use and they come out perfect. GREAT GREAT HOME investment. I was hesitant to spend $40 on a mop... Ill never need to buy another. after 3 years its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Andrea411

customer_reviews.title: Engineered Wood Floors?  Get this Mop.
customer_reviews.text: My floors are engineered wood and show every foot print, smudge, and wash marks. I have tried several mops and products but all leave the wash marks behind. This mop has been the best I have used. If you wring it out well, it will not leave the water marks. It is big so you can cover more ground than your typical mop. It's a well built and sturdy mop so I don't see the wand breaking or coming undone like the others I have tried. I hate mopping and so any product that helps me get through the daunting task easier is one that I am a fan off.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mop!!! I almost didn't buy it because one review said she had problems with the handle. I am 5'8" and I don't have to bend over and it glides around great .... a plus for someone who has had back surgery. It's super easy to adhere the pads due to the velcro and sticks very well!! I like the wide width as it covers a good amount of area with each swipe. I'd definitely buy this again. This is from someone who doesn't write too many reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Bo

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: My house does not get a lot of dirty traffic like mud; what I do have is pet hair, dirt from shoes, dust. This mop keeps my floors very clean with very little effort. I just spray the mop head with a solution of Murphy's and water for the hardwood floors and for the tile floors, I use a vinegar based water spray and the floors come out very clean. I just detach the strip and throw it in the washing machine for next use. NICE!
customer_reviews.author: apricot

customer_reviews.title: Best mop I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I was going to break down and get a norwex mop but because they are so expensive I thought I would try this one instead and boy am I glad I did. The mop is large and swivels very easy. You can dry mop with the microfiber mop and then it comes with one to wet mop. This makes cleaning all my hardwood floors much easier
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Try it you'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I dampen then put my clean pad in the microwave for 1 minute the heat really helps clean. Good quality well engineered. It replaced my old Trasan which was great but not as sturdy as this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy cleaning with this mop. It is sturdy. It is large so I can clean faster, yet the head swivels so that it can fit into corners and tight spaces well. The velcro-like surface for adhering the pads to the mop are nicely made and hold the pads well. I like that the pad with the "fringe" gets the quarter-round molding clean too. I use this with a spray cleaner that I spray on the floor ahead of the mop and prefer this to a mop with it's own spray mechanism. Much easier than a sponge mop and sturdier than other similar mops I have used.
customer_reviews.author: MamaZ

customer_reviews.title: This Is A Serious Mop
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly for the duster. I have wood floors thru the whole house. This duster does a much better job than the Swiffer at picking up cat and people hair. And it's BIG, so the job goes faster. It has a good swivel and a low profile for getting under furniture. The only thing I don't like about the duster is I can't shake it out. I have to pick off gunk over the wastebasket. To do a good cleanup I put it in the dryer on the Touch Up cycle, but it makes the dryer kinda dirty. Still...I wouldn't go back to Swiffer.
customer_reviews.author: sharon wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This mop is definitely heavy duty. I have nothing but hardwood floors in my home. The size of the mop head shortens the time to do the job. The frame handle and other parts seem to be of high quality. The microfiber pads are excellent.The only reason I did not give five stars is that the pad is so heavy it makes it difficult to wring out. My wife dose not have the strength to do it, so I end up doing all the mopping. Perhaps the owner of the company is a woman?? I would reorder this product without question...
customer_reviews.author: James E Latson

customer_reviews.title: Best duster ever!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product! Handles dust on hard wood floors better then any vac or duster I have approx 3000 sq ft of hard wood floors. 1 was never able to get the floors free of fine dust when I vacuumed or dusted with Endust. This mop picks up the very fine dust. The center pad seems to loosen the fine dirt from the floor and the outside edge attracts the loosed dirt. My rubber soled shoes seem sticky on the hard wood because the floor is so clean. In addition, the duster is fast and easy to use. No more noisy heavy vac.
customer_reviews.author: How

customer_reviews.title: It feels like my floor isn't clean
customer_reviews.text: This might be psychosomatic, but I just feel like my floor isn't clean if all I'm doing is using water to wash it, and then wringing out the dirty wet microfiber thing in the tub and sticking it back on. It just doesn't feel clean. It's also REALLY big. Not great for apartments or tight spaces. I've had it for a while, but I'm going to donate it and buy something smaller.
customer_reviews.author: missgordTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best mop purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to start saving money so I discontinued my cleaning ladies. This mop will more than pay for itself. It was a dream to use and worked wonderful with just water and vinegar. The floors were cleaner than they had ever been and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Parks

customer_reviews.title: This mop is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop! Most of my house is textured tile so before I bought this I was using swifter pads and I had to mop all floors 2 or 3 times to get everything up. This mop head has a thick texture and gets into all the grooves of my tile the first time. I just bought another one for my other house which has wood floors throughout and I bought one for my daughter as well. The head swivels under all the furniture. I love this mop! It greatly cuts down on my work and my back doesn't hurt either!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great mop!
customer_reviews.text: We just had new wood and tile floors put in, also a much bigger area. I use to use the swiffer but it was too small. I have used the dry mop and the wet mop in the short time I have had it, they both work great. The dry mop is great for just sweeping up dust and dog fur, lots of dog fur! The wet mop for mud after it rains or watered the lawn. Use to hate cleaning the floor because I have a lot of physical disabilities, but now I actually enjoy it! Love the strong Velcro, no more floppy mop!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first but boy was I wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Was very skeptical to purchase. We have a brand new house with about 3000 sf of hardwood floors, 800 sf of tile, and a very shedding 100# black lab. So house still has a lot of construction dust. Where it comes from I'll never know, but the dust mop does and excellent job as well as the wet mop. Very impressed with product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I threw my steam mop away. I cannot believe how well this works! With 2 teenage boys and an 85lb dog who tracks mud/dirt in (even though I wipe her feet), I’m constantly cleaning.. this mop has made cleaning my kitchen floor and wood floors a breeze!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one, don't waste your money on others!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed! This is the best mop/sweeper combination ever! The sweeper worked great for picking up dog hair! The mop pads are truly amazing! My floors look brand new. Very easy to use and worth every penny! My family and I are very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Marla F.

customer_reviews.title: I’m not feeling good about Velcro design.
customer_reviews.text: I like the length of the pole and the microfiber cloth picks up a lot. Easy to clean them in the wash. However, I prefer my old mop that slipped onto the base instead of the Velcro. I feel like this one won’t last whereas my old mop is still going after several years.
customer_reviews.author: Suzani

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop! I had been using a swiffer for my hardwood, both to dust and wet mop. I hated how many sheets I was going through. But this is a pleasure! It reaches under my piano further then the swifter. What dust I pulled out. I love that I can wash, wring and reuse the mop head. Or just throw it in the washer. A+ purchase
customer_reviews.author: Carlotta Brainard

customer_reviews.title: Beats Swiffer all to pieces!
customer_reviews.text: We have hardwood floors through out the house and this dust mop has simplified my daily routine. Changing the mop head is super easy....just peel it off. The mop lays flat to get under furniture, swivels and is wide enough to speed the dusting process. No, it does not replace a vacuum; however, it works very well picking up dust, lint etc. If you have wood floors, you know everything shows!
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: I love this mop!
customer_reviews.text: This style of mop works far better than anything else I've used. I don't have a large apartment, so the 16-18" size is perfect. The original mop pads they supply work well for cleaning, but they are so stiff, it's difficult to wring out any excess water, so I bought some other ones to make it a bit easier. Overall, this mop does an excellent job of cleaning, and the build quality is top notch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, just tighten bolts before 1st use.
customer_reviews.text: I would have left a 5 star because it's so easy to use and effective at cleaning tiles with but while using it for the 1st time, the locking mechanism where the stick meets the mop fell apart. After looking it over, putting it back together was easy. It was just a disappointing 1st experience to have it fall apart during my 1st time using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Vargas

customer_reviews.title: #1 for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mop for hardwood floors but I was done with the Swiffer and didn't want to continue to throw pads away. A quick Google search turned me on to this mop, absolutely phenomenal The telescoping handle alone makes this mop worth it. No More bending over. The pads clean great and the dust head picks up my dog hair like a beast. On top of all that I received a handwritten card from microfiber wholesale thanking me for my purchase, you just don't get that kind of customer service anymore. Bravo microfiber wholesale for doing things how they should be done
customer_reviews.author: justin d strand

customer_reviews.title: Deserving of an award!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Holy Grail of mops! Easy to assemble. Sturdy. The handle adjusts easily so you can custom the height to avoid back strain. The mop heads are thick, soft and strong. They feel they will last through many washings. 18 inch surface cuts my dry dusting and wet mopping by 75%! I was literally finished cleaning my kitchen and laundry room floors in less than ten minutes (my two rooms are very large). I suffer with arthritis of the spine, hips and fingers and this mop made my worst weekly chore so much easier I will be able to do it everyday now with no problem! Thank you SO much!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Works well but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: The mop cleans well and is easy to use, but only for a short while! I just ordered our third one in slightly under two months! For $40, I would have expected this to last longer. Unfortunately I haven't found one that works better so here I am again buying a third one.
customer_reviews.author: 40 something CA country boy
